root.title: Mozilla Firefox 20.0 beta1 版本发布
root.content:
继昨日Firefox 19正式版发布之后，Mozilla今天又发布了Firefox 20.0 beta1版本，支持了全新的下载窗口了，

下载地址：

http://download.cdn.mozilla.net/pub/mozilla.org/firefox/releases/20.0b1/win32/zh-CN/

NEW                                          Per-tab private browsing  NEW                                          Gingerbread and Honeycomb support for H.264/AAC/MP3 hardware decoders  CHANGED                                          System requirements have been lowered to 384MB of RAM and QVGA displays  DEVELOPER                                          CSS3 Flexbox implemented and enabled by default  DEVELOPER                                          Continued implementation of draft ECMAScript 6 - clear() and Math.imul  HTML5                                          <canvas> now supports blend modes  HTML5                                          Various <audio> and <video> improvements  HTML5                                          getUserMedia

implemented for web access to the user\'s camera and microphone (with

user permission)
root.contentx:
继昨日Firefox 19正式版发布之后，Mozilla今天又发布了Firefox 20.0 beta1版本，支持了全新的下载窗口了，
下载地址：
http://download.cdn.mozilla.net/pub/mo
